name: Old Chunk System Demo: Labyrinth
description:
Another demo of an earlier version of the 3D Chunk System I'm building that was hosted on my personal portfolio website.

As with the others the concept is very simple. The system generates a maze and you can run through it. The minimap shows a trail indicating where you have been. In this demo the chunk system does not itself follow the player's movement, so the maze is limited to a circle around the origin.

Controls:
Click "Play/Restart" at the top left to generate the maze; if you find yourself trapped, click again to generate a new maze
Left mouse and drag to control the camera view
W/A/S/D to move
Left Shift to run
